fields.name: NOTICE_DATE
fields.doc: date and time of notice creation

fields.name: TRIGGER_NUM
fields.doc: string of alpha and digits uniquely identifying event

fields.name: SEG_NUM
fields.doc: Swift serial number (for Swift notice types only)

fields.name: SRC_RA
fields.doc: RA of GRB/Transient in J2000 epoch [deg]

fields.name: SRC_DEC
fields.doc: Dec of GRB/Transient in J2000 epoch [deg]

fields.name: X_OFFSET
fields.doc: the coordinates of pixel_zero in the Image subarray in detector coordinates (0-2095)[pixels]

fields.name: Y_OFFSET
fields.doc: the coordinates of pixel_zero in the Image subarray in detector coordinates (0-2095)[pixels]

fields.name: WIDTH
fields.doc: size of the Image subarray in detector coordinates (0-2095)[pixels]

fields.name: HEIGHT
fields.doc: size of the Image subarray in detector coordinates (0-2095)[pixels]

fields.name: X_GRB_POS
fields.doc: the position of the GRB in unbinned detector units

fields.name: Y_GRB_POS
fields.doc: the position of the GRB in unbinned detector units

fields.name: BINNING_INDEX
fields.doc: pixel binning, eg =0 means 1x1 binning (ie none), =1 mean 2x2 binning, =2 means 4x4 binning, up to =6 mean 64x64 binning.

fields.name: IM_URL
fields.doc: full URL of the UVOT Image

fields.name: MISC_19
fields.doc: 32 Flag Bits. See https://gcn.gsfc.nasa.gov/sock_pkt_def_doc.html for definition of bits, some bits may not be defined
